name: deimosrising
text: Roast Beef was always a little behind the curve

name: zem
text: it's also possible he wasn't willing to like things until they were a little old

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt2, novacaine, clintisiceman)

name: tetrisattack
text: A comment left by tetrisattack was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by novacaine, VictoriaW, Darthemed)

name: godfatherofsouls
text: A comment left by godfatherofsouls was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Latterman, novacaine, VictoriaW)

name: lux
text: It would be worse if the girl did kiss a guy. He'd have a panic attack imagining the inevitable problems that their relationship would suffer

name: dusty
text: I don't think he would have fallen in with the emo crowd anyway, his problem isn't that his parents were too busy working to give him everything he needs to spend all their time praising him for doing nothing.

name: landowmpg
text: I like how he seems to hunch more and more over the ten years, as if the weight of the world is slowly crushing him.

name: revdj
text:
(1) Excellent use of the word "tasty"
(2) Roast Beef and I share a Birthday. Earth Day!

name: belgand
text: That's also my mother's birthday. Have fun with that.

name: gompo
text: A comment left by gompo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by seven47, GeyserShitdick, odei)

name: geysershitdick
text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, Dovey, straw, RiazM, Zefiel, madnes, FVVS, Nurdbot, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, Deusoma, fell, mashisoyo, gothfae, goocifer, equinn2006, apricotta, 762, Sargasm, DougTheHead, whuppins, foetus_punch, cailetshadow, SeanBad, clintisiceman, Tibia, saucy_jack, lizjones)

name: andrew_
text: ehhhhhhthatwasrudehhhhhhh

name: autrepoupee
text: actually you are both wrong that is clearly a muscle shirt which is even more lol!

name: soticoto
text: Looks more of a vest to me.

name: farqussus
text: Yeah, people react strongly to excessively aggressive shutdowns. I know.

name: jollysaintpete
text: i'm glad at least two other people found "geysershitdick" going off on someone for calling a type of clothing by the wrong name pretty damn funny

name: gethen
text: oh how i love seeing roast beef in his formative years with hair such as a man would have when searching for himself.

name: woodenteeth
text: and when he found himself... no hair. Imagine what you will.

name: wittyname
text: Finding yourself brings about a certain peace of mind. I doubt Roast Beef has achieved this.

name: iloveyoucupcake
text: The DK Roast Beef looks exactly like my boyfriend did in high school.

name: carpetbag
text: I guess those photos were taken before the Kazenzakis curse kicked in. Or maybe it doesn't work on Polaroids?

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I think the curse was mainly applying to his hair at the time. I mean, look at those hideous bangs! I would totally have been tight with Beef in high school. I love Venom and the Dead Kennedys, and I would've been that much more into them at the time. The last photo gives me a sort of "I got a computer job, but I still mess up my hair and listen to the Pixies and U2 in my cubicle" vibe.

name: m3funkyb
text: this interpretation works alright for me

name: hateandwar
text: The camera that took them was not Hecho en Mexico.

name: ruderuderudy
text: That also had a lot to do with Mexican magical realism, so perhaps the "curse" was exagerated.

name: a_dude
text: Dead Kennedys rule.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Heartily seconded.

name: kingsleymc
text: One of my all-time favs.  Who the hell doesn't like meals?  Roast Beef.  That's who.

name: riazm
text: I fucking hate meals.

name: nurdbot
text: I never seen this one before! Those photos rock!

name: 1000hz
text:
Whoa, Beef and my dad have the same birthday! Earth Day Birthday!

OOOOOHHH SHIIIIIT

name: boredom_man
text:
Also Jack Nicholson, V.I. Lenin, and Alexander Kerensky exactly 10 years before the the red leader

and me too

it is impossible to have a birthday that does not smell like tofu and blood

name: ich_bin_ilya
text: this is one of my favorites, all due to the last panel. something about his phrasing... damn!

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "The third hair thing is Enya hair."

name: spectre
text: The DEAD KENNEDYS, y'all! THE DEAD KENNEDYS!

name: joeyramoney
text: "tasty little meals."

name: boyd
text: Man, you just know he was a thrash fan.

name: ibetso
text: Roast Beef needs to borrow the tape Philippe got from his mother...."It's a triumph for your body when you keep yourself fed"

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Roast Beef's emotions make him a monster.

name: dasilodavi
text: Roast Beef's "tiny text" is the most iconic part of the strip to me.

name: deusoma
text: It's getting closer to his modern stylings. Now he just needs to drop the punctuation

name: mashisoyo
text: Yes, this is EPOCHAL, why are there no other comments marking this transition?

name: wae
text: It is impossible to have a good meal.

name: cherubrocker22
text: Funny - in this strip, the cats live in human time, while in early strips, Ray was referred to as being 5 years old (and neutered)

name: stwee
text: He, Roast Beef, doesn't like life.

name: tekende
text: That is a tiny, tiny Hot Pot.

name: coco
text: I love how surprised Teodor looks.

name: sharkofsomerton
text: Where I live a hot pot is a electric vagina that you can place your junk in for gratification.

name: dovey
text: Does anybody else think that maybe the phases of young Beef might reflect the phases of a young Chris Onstad?

name: red-barchetta
text: Hah! Teodor is all like " How can you not like meals?" in that last panel. I ask the same question.

name: steerpike66
text: Maybe he's a snack kind of guy? His childhood was chaotic.

name: tad-
text: I wonder what Beef's favorite Venom album is.

name: skavid
text:
Beef's musical/hairstyle choices follow mine to a 't'

OR DO MINE FOLLOW HIS?!?!?

name: caeristhiona
text: Roast Beef does NOT like life.

name: greenkoolayd
text:
enya hair

[IMGS OFF]

name: atypicaloracle
text: I wonder... did Roast Beef wear a cat-sized wig back in small times, or did he do the cat version of shaving his dome when he finally came up? I ask because he does not have the black head covering required to produce even a modest mullet never mind a terrifying new wave mop or that now-stylish bed head he had back in '99.
